name: Beuser & Angus Special
instructions:
1. Combine the first five ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake hard with ice.
2. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
3. Top with orange flower water.
description: Chartreuse sour from Berlin, the Beuser & Angus Special takes inspiration from the Last Word and the Ramos Gin Fizz. Created in 2007 by Gon√ßalo de Sousa Monteiro for fellow bartenders Bastian Heuser and Angus Winchester, the drink has gone on to become a modern classic.

ingredients.name: Green Chartreuse
ingredients.description: Green Chartreuse is a herbal liqueur made by the Carthusian monks in France. It is known for its vibrant green color and complex flavor profile derived from a secret blend of 130 herbs and botanicals. Green Chartreuse has a strong and distinct taste, featuring herbal, floral, and spicy notes. It has a high alcohol content, typically 55% ABV (alcohol by volume). Green Chartreuse can be enjoyed on its own as a digestif or used in cocktails for its unique and intense flavor.

ingredients.name: Lime juice
ingredients.description:
Lime juice is a key player in the world of cocktails, renowned for its bright, sharp, and slightly sweeter flavor compared to lemon juice. Extracted from fresh limes, this citrus juice adds a vibrant, zesty kick to drinks, making it an indispensable ingredient in many classic and contemporary cocktails.


When using lime juice in cocktails, freshly squeezed is highly recommended for its superior taste and aroma. The amount used can vary depending on the recipe, but even a small quantity can significantly brighten and enliven a drink. Its versatility allows it to pair well with a wide range of spirits, from tequila and rum to gin and vodka.

ingredients.name: Maraschino
ingredients.description:
Liqueur obtained from the distillation of Marasca cherries. The small, slightly sour fruit of the Tapiwa cherry tree, which grows wild along parts of the Dalmatian coast in Croatia, lends the liqueur its unique aroma.

The Luxardo family, an Italian producer, is particularly well-known for its Maraschino liqueur.

ingredients.name: Egg White
ingredients.description: Egg white is the clear liquid part of an egg that surrounds the yolk. It is rich in proteins and is commonly used in cooking and baking for its ability to add structure, foam, and a smooth texture to various dishes.

ingredients.name: Simple Syrup
ingredients.description:
Simple syrup is a basic sweetener used in cocktails, made by dissolving sugar in water. The standard recipe is a 1:1 ratio of sugar to water, although variations exist, such as rich simple syrup, which uses a 2:1 ratio for a thicker, sweeter result. The syrup is clear and easily mixes with both cold and hot liquids, making it an essential ingredient in many drinks.

Simple syrup can also be infused with additional flavors like herbs, spices, or fruits, adding a layer of complexity to cocktails.

ingredients.name: Orange Flower Water
ingredients.description: Clear aromatic by-product of the distillation of fresh bitter-orange blossoms for their essential oil.
